name: Mix Pakora
description: Onion, spinach, cabbage, battered and fried in lentil flavor

name: Vegetable Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice, mixed vegetables, and a blend of spices

name: Aloo Gobi
description: Tender potatoes and sweet green peas cooked in a spiced tomato-based curry

name: Egg Curry
description: Boiled eggs, lightly fried and cooked in curry sauce prepared with tamarind, onion and tomato base

name: Palak Paneer
description: Creamy spinach puree cooked with aromatic spices, onions, and tomatoes, accompanied by cubes of soft paneer

name: Dal Curry
description: Lentils cooked with tomatoes and spinach with spices

name: Sambar
description: Lentil stew brimming with vegetables, aromatic spices, and a tangy tamarind twist

name: Goat Curry
description: Tender goat meat cooked in a savory curry sauces

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Chicken marinated in exotically spiced yogurt and roasted in clay oven

name: Butter Chicken
description: Juicy chicken cooked in luscious tomato and yogurt sauce, seasoned with a blend of traditional Indian spices

name: Naan
description: Freshly baked bread with a soft texture and a hint of butter

name: Rice Kheer
description: Rich and creamy rice simmered in sweetened milk, garnished with nuts and spices
